titleInfo.title: Photograph of woman modeling an Easter hat decorated with Easter bunny and Easter egg, 1956

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: Black-and-white photograph three-quarters view of an unidentified woman, smiling, who is touching and admiring her Easter hat in a mirror. Her hat is adorned with a white Easter rabbit and an Easter egg in front. The woman is dressed in a dark shawl with plaid skirt or pants. Photograph taken at Castner Knott Department Store during the Easter season of 1956 by photographer Paul Schleicher of the Nashville Banner newspaper. Forms part of the Nashville Banner Archives. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 3.25 x 4.25 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital image. This image is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without written permission. Please contact the repository for permission to use this image.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS 3.5 from a qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America, using a stylesheet available at https://github.com/utkdigitalinitiatives/DLTN. Metadata originally created in a locally modified version of qualified Dublin Core using ContentDM (data dictionary available: https://wiki.lib.utk.edu/display/DPLA.)
